titleStmt.title: Proclamation against slanderers and leesing-makers
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
McKenzie, Colin.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Colin McKenzie, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the seventeenth day of June, one thousand six hundred eighty six years.
Wing number J309C (item at 869:21), cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
